thread.title: The Schuyler Sisters Just Won the Super Bowl
thread.title_full: The Schuyler Sisters Just Won the Super Bowl

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: The Schuyler Sisters Just Won the Super Bowl
text:
We can officially all go home, y'all — because we already know who won the big game.
To start this year's Super Bowl off right, Hamilton 's original Schuyler Sisters — a.k.a., Renée Elise Goldsberry, Jasmine Cephas Jones, and Phillipa Soo — took to the field to perform a gorgeous a cappella rendition of America the Beautiful, slaying absolutely everyone in the country with their flawless harmonies. And just to further prove their epic abilities and give a shout-out to girl power, the ladies made one slight lyric change to the song, adding "and sisterhood" right in the middle.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 'Hamilton' cast sings: "And crown thy good with brotherhood — and sisterhood — from sea to shining sea." https://t.co/eW8DmApvH2 #SB51 pic.twitter.com/v0Qk2WQ1x3
— Hollywood Reporter (@THR) February 5, 2017 To perhaps no one's surprise, Hamilton 's creator Lin Manuel Miranda immediately took to social media to sing the praises of these immensely talented women.
AND SISTERHOOD. pic.twitter.com/2Zx8Sg9XmW
— Lin-Manuel Miranda (@Lin_Manuel) February 5, 2017 AND THAT'S @LacketyLac on the arrangement, y'all. #AndSisterhood
— Lin-Manuel Miranda (@Lin_Manuel) February 5, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below #Superbowl pic.twitter.com/c2vqSSUyod
— Lin-Manuel Miranda (@Lin_Manuel) February 6, 2017 And of course, the rest of the internet agreed, too.
When my kids ask who won the 2017 #Superbowl , all I'm going to say is "the Schuyler Sisters." #AndSisterhood
— Lorenz Gido (@KyloRenzGido) February 5, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below We can stop the game now, the Schuyler Sisters already won #AndSisterhood
— Tessa Newell (@TessaGNewell) February 5, 2017 It's crazy how Hamilton also won the Super Bowl. #andsisterhood
— kathryn gallagher (@kathryng) February 5, 2017 Follow Gina on Twitter .
